title: Score
brief_description: Soft-pornography/erotica from director Radley Metzger resplendent with witty dialogue, telephone repairman and funky music. Older married couple Elvira and Jack like to ‘swing’ and indulge frequently in sex parties with strangers or other couples. Betsy and Eddy are younger, naive newlyweds that become the latest object of desire for Elvira and Jack and the game is on to see who will win their conquest first. Eventually, Elvira and Betsy then Jack and Eddy form up to get high and get busy. A fantasy romp that includes dressing-up, drugs and mirrors. Cast includes Claire Wilbur, Calvin Culver, Lynn Lowry, Gerald Grant, Carl Parker.
